detail.Name: Warehouse Name
detail.IncomingTwoSteps: 2 Steps: Unload in input location then go to stock
detail.IncomingThreeSteps: 3 Steps: Unload in input location, go through a quality control before being admitted in stock
detail.OutgoingShipOnly: Ship Only: Ship directly from stock
detail.OutgoingPickShip: Pick + Ship: Bring goods to output location before shipping
detail.OutgoingPickPackShip: Pick + Pack + Ship: Make packages into a dedicated location, then bring them to the output location for shipping
